entry.title: $2221 // 1-BR apartment in Avalon Fort Greene
entry.content:
1-BR apartment in the Avalon Fort Greene
Relocating for work, need to transfer apartment to new occupant until end of lease-- in November 2019. Monthly rent is $2,221.00 (not including electric and cable). **Rent stabilized.** The apartment is unfurnished, but would consider selling furniture at a discount. Washer and dryer in unit. Plenty of storage. Floor to ceiling windows. Walking distance to all train lines. Easy and fast commute/ drive to Manhattan.
Available from Feb 4 (February rent will be prorated)
Application fee-- $300
Deposit-- $2,221 + $500
